thread.title: Lady Gaga announces 'Joanne' world tour following breathtaking Super Bowl set
thread.title_full: Lady Gaga announces 'Joanne' world tour following breathtaking Super Bowl set

author: USA TODAY
title: Lady Gaga announces 'Joanne' world tour following breathtaking Super Bowl set
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Lady Gaga announces 'Joanne' world tour following breathtaking Super Bowl set The 'Joanne' artist is flying high. Post to Facebook Lady Gaga announces 'Joanne' world tour following breathtaking Super Bowl set The 'Joanne' artist is flying high. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/2kF1Vwv Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Lady Gaga announces 'Joanne' world tour following breathtaking Super Bowl set Jaleesa M. Jones , USA TODAY Published 9:22 a.m. ET Feb. 6, 2017 | Updated 2 minutes ago Lady Gaga performs onstage during the Pepsi Zero Sugar Super Bowl LI Halftime Show at NRG Stadium on Feb. 5, 2017 in Houston. (Photo: Kevin Mazur, WireImage) 
Lady Gaga is flying high. 
In the wake of her blockbuster Super Bowl LI halftime performance on Sunday, the pop provocateur announced her Joanne world tour, teasing graphics for the affair on Twitter and Instagram. 
As of Monday, Gaga’s official website had been updated to reflect a slew of tour dates. The singer-songwriter will start the tour on a high note, opening Aug. 1 at Rogers Arena in Vancouver, British Columbia, before hitting venues across the U.S., including The Forum in Inglewood, Calif., the Verizon Center in Washington and AmericanAirlines Arena in Miami. The tour is slated to wrap on Dec. 14 in Salt Lake City. — xoxo, Joanne (@ladygaga) February 6, 2017 
The Joanne world tour marks Gaga’s first major tour since her Cheek to Cheek tour with jazz/pop virtuoso Tony Bennett, which ran from 2014 to 2015. The megastar opted for more intimate shows with her latest venture: A three-stop dive bar tour previewing tracks from her critically-received album, Joanne , which bowed at No. 1 on the Billboard 200 charts. 
By contrast, the 48-date Joanne world tour promises to be a sweeping affair and will likely hinge on the " raw Americana " vibe that characterized Gaga's fifth studio album. Fans can find the complete list of tour dates here . A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Lady Gaga performs during the Super Bowl LI halftime show.
